definition: fortune as unpredictable as the weather, every day may bring fortune or calamity (idiom); sth unexpected may happen at any moment
pinyin: tian1 you3 bu4 ce4 feng1 yun2 , ren2 you3 dan4 xi1 huo4 fu2
containing_words.word: 天有不測風雲，人有旦夕禍福

definition: beset by a series of mishaps (idiom)

sentences.english: I have kept a reserve fund in case of accidents.

sentences.english: Although the sun was shining the other day, my father took the umbrella with him to be on the safe side.

sentences.english: Shit happens, especially when a newbie is "trying his best".

sentences.english: On the other hand, relatively few people have had badexperiences with Apple.

sentences.english: It could put it in the bank and save it for a rainy day.

sentences.english: In such an eventuality, full fee shall be refunded to the student.
